name: D.O.T.S - Connecting Those Dots
description:
D.O.T.S - Connecting Those Dots

A short puzzle game I developed as a personal Phaser 3 project based on this popular Dots game:

https://www.dots.co/dots/

The goal is to connect all adjacent dots of the same color to clear them out. The longer the connected line, the more points you can score. Making a loop by connecting them would clear out all dots of that same color.
